data.description:
Survive and Expel Evil Spirits in Your Own Home!

Turn your house into a terrifying horror game where evil spirits will hunt you down. These spirits can navigate your physical environment, making each encounter even more immersive. With up to 10 unique spirits, each possessing different abilities and hunting styles, every experience is a new challenge.

Important:

After downloading, please restart your headset to resolve any tracking issues. Meta room scans may occasionally shift due to lighting conditions or movement, requiring you to rescan or redraw your rooms.
Make sure your doors link properly between scanned rooms, and ensure no doors lead outside of the scanned areas. Large holes in walls can cause the nav mesh to extend outside the game boundaries.

The nav mesh must be fully contained within your play area with no linkage to the outside.

Mixed Reality Boundaries are finally removed! Multi-room gameplay is now available to the average player.

Note: Quest 1 is not supported.

If you need help with setup or have feedback, join the Discord community via the link on the company website. This game is in early access and experimental, but your support will help it grow and improve.

Please consider leaving a review if you enjoyed the game. Reviews help motivate the creator to continue supporting the project and adding more content.

For any setup issues, feedback, or suggestions, please reach out to the creator directly through the Discord link. https://discord.gg/53d4NQnDE9
